byline: Stan Alcorn, Noel King and Aparna Alluri
teaser: Airing on Thursday, April 16, 2015:  First up, we talk to Santosh Rao, head of research at Manhattan Venture Partners, about Etsy’s IPO. Next up is James Grimmelmann, Law Professor at the University of Maryland, talking about the antitrust charges Google is facing in the EU. Finally, we take a look at what happens when PayPal is incompatible with another country's banking system.

title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, April 16, 2015
